thread.title: BRIEF-Lear Increases Share Repurchase Authorization To $1.5 Bln, Raises Quarterly Cash Dividend By 40 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lear Increases Share Repurchase Authorization To $1.5 Bln, Raises Quarterly Cash Dividend By 40 Pct
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Lear Corp:
* LEAR INCREASES SHARE REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION TO $1.5 BILLION AND RAISES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND BY 40% FROM $0.50 TO $0.70 PER SHARE
* LEAR - ‍BOARD AUTHORIZED AN INCREASE IN COMPANY‘S SHARE REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION TO $1.5 BILLION AND EXTENDED AUTHORIZATION PERIOD UNTIL DECEMBER 31, 2020​
* LEAR CORP - BOARD RAISED QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND ON COMPANY‘S COMMON STOCK BY 40% FROM $0.50 PER SHARE TO $0.70 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
